duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nutrition and hospitality service to assigned patients, including solicitation of preferences, processing and maintaining patient diet orders.
Resolve any food and nutrition related issues and complete tray passing and pick up for assigned patients daily.
Receive and document patient information in accordance with the facility requirements in the computer system.
Create and provide meal tickets, production sheets, and relay any additional information as needed throughout the department.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred
